summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Brothers of the Highway Member Directory app. Backend APIs are fully functional with minor status code fixes applied. Frontend UI works well with professional design, but has modal overlay issues preventing form submissions in member/user creation dialogs.

resolved_issues.issue: Returned 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
Returned 200 instead of 201 for successful creation

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for missing tokens (FastAPI HTTPBearer default behavior)

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocks dropdown selections in member creation form
ui_bugs.selector: Modal backdrop div intercepts pointer events

ui_bugs.issue: Same modal overlay issue affects user creation form
ui_bugs.selector: Modal backdrop div intercepts pointer events

working_features.status: ✅ Email (mailto:), Phone (tel:), Address (Google Maps) all work
✅ User Management navigation and back button work

passed_tests: Backend API authentication and token verification
All member CRUD operations via API
Role-based access control (admin vs user permissions)
Clickable email, phone, and address links

success_percentage.backend: 95% (22/24 tests passed - minor status code issues resolved)
success_percentage.frontend: 80% (core functionality works, but form submissions blocked by modal overlay)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index issue in member and user creation dialogs. The backdrop overlay is intercepting pointer events, preventing dropdown selections and form submissions. This is likely a CSS z-index or event handling issue with the shadcn/ui Dialog component.
